reference_summary:
Trophy Wife Cosmetics Lipstick - Semi Matte - Natural, Vegan & Cruelty Free Anna
Trophy Wife
{'Brand': 'Trophy Wife', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Semi-Matte, Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '670924966586'}
I am in love with this lipstick! The packaging looks luxurious to me and really stands out from my collection. I went with this shade which is a bright red with orange tones. It just goes with everything I wear and surprisingly my hair color at the moment. I also like how versatile this is so I can dress up or down with this color. It is 100% vegan, made with plant based wax and other natural ingredients like candelilla wax, castor seed oil, shea butter, almond oil, grape seed oil, jojoba, and coconut oil. The lipstick feels very smooth when applying and it I didn’t need a liner. And I think I reapplied when I remembered to after 3 hours and held up fine without any chapping or colorless patches. This is cruelty-free too!
Favorite new lipstick
Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Catrice
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
It’s such a beautiful warm bronzer! Great for the summertime to get that golden goddess glow. I love the embossing and the packaging is very compacted. It’s lightweight and I can throw it into my bag to carry it with me.
Luminous Bronzer
C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
C'est Moi
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
Not bad for gentle cleansing water. I was able to remove a lot of impurities and not irritate my dry sensitive skin. However, it's soap-free but when I took the bottle out, it started bubbling. I think you can see them in my picture. And it felt like a lightweight liquid soap. I double cleanse so it doesn't matter if there is residue but I don't think I wouldn’t leave it on without rinsing after. It's still really good cleansing water for the price point!
Gentle Cleansing Water Indeed
Caudalie Favorites Set
{'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'}
If you never tried this brand before, this is the best way to give their popular products a try. It came with a beautiful bag and  5 different skincare products, a cleanser, serum, moisturizer, eye cream, and a mist! They all basically promote different skin issues but for the most part targets fine lines, wrinkles, aging spots, and improve dull-looking skin. Everything here works well together but can be used separately as well depending on your skincare routine. So happy with this set!
Caudalie Bestseller Travel Kit
C'est Moi Vanilla Vibes Sugar Balm Body Scrub | Invigorating & Hydrating Exfoliant, Clinically Tested Non-Toxic Ingredients feat. Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil & Avocado Oil, EWG Verified, 6 oz
C'est Moi
{'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sugar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 3.5 x 2 inches; 6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PR-COM-RT-X994317', 'UPC': '039897302607'}
Scrubbing away dead cell skin with this sugar balm scrub felt good! It is formulated with organic sugar, shea butter, coconut and avocado oils to gentle slough away body built up. It’s a wet sugary consistency that is easy to scrub all over. The rinsing does take a little bit of time to fully get all the residue off. Unlike dry scrub, it does not make a mess in the shower. It smells good and leaves my skin looking glowy!
Vanilla Sugar Scrub
Moist Toilet Wipes, Septic and Sewer Safe 4packs
Baskrean

It’s good to have. My Bf likes having this around. We can travel with it and leave it in the bathroom to use when needed. The packaging is simple and not outrageous or obvious. And it's flushable and safe.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys cosmetics, particularly semi-matte lip products and bronzers for a sun-kissed look. Recently expanded her interest to include gentle cleansing and skincare products that effectively remove impurities while soothing sensitive skin. She has developed a liking for practical body care solutions, appreciating products that offer hydration and gentle exfoliation.

- **Values:** Strongly favors vegan and cruelty-free products, emphasizing a commitment to ethical and clean beauty brands; prioritizes gentle formulations suitable for sensitive skin while embracing multi-functional skincare options. She values non-toxic ingredients and ethically produced items that enhance overall skin health.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Appreciates luxurious packaging and vibrant colors; maintains a fondness for bright red shades with orange tones and beautifully crafted bronzers, alongside attractive skincare items and practical products with understated, elegant packaging.

- **Application Experience:** Prefers lipsticks that glide on smoothly without the need for additional products and values long-lasting wear, comfort, and moisturizing benefits. She seeks efficient, gentle cleansing experiences that provide a clean feel without mess or hassle.

- **Use Cases:** Looks for versatility in makeup suitable for various outfits and occasions; seeks products that enhance her summer glow, complement double cleansing routines, and enjoys practical items for travel and daily use.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Demonstrates a high level of satisfaction with products that align with her ethical and performance-related values, actively seeking quality, aesthetic appeal, and effective skincare solutions, while relishing opportunities to try new, best-selling products.
